snippet.title: Batman: Arkham Knight PS4 Exclusive Content Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Get a sneak peak at the great Batman: Arkham Knight content coming to PlayStation®4 at launch.

https://www.playstation.com/en-us/explore/ps4/systems/batman-arkham-knight-ps4-bundle/

Don your futuristic Justice League 3000 Batsuit or revisist the past with Classic TV Series Batman and Batmobile skins and get ready to face off against a towering vision of Scarecrow and his undead army as they spread terror on the streets in the Scarecrow Nightmare Missions.

BATMAN: ARKHAM KNIGHT software © 2015 Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. Developed by Rocksteady Studios. All other trademarks and copyrights are the property of their respective owners.  All rights reserved.
 

BATMAN and all characters, their distinctive likenesses, and related elements are trademarks of DC Comics © 2015. All Rights Reserved.
WB GAMES LOGO, WB SHIELD: ™ & © Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. 
(s15)
